venue.name: "Common Ground" Meeting Hall at Peaceful Assembly Church

item.description:
Muni Savyon will host a workshop for potential candidates for State House and other local positions.

Speakers:
- Mark Warden, State Representative
- Dennis Corrigan, expert on Reports of Receipts & Expenditures

We'll cover:
- Why running for office is the most effective way to restore freedom.
- What do I need to do to run for State Rep.
- What support to expect.
And more.

The meeting is for:
- Freedom loving people (Ron Paul supporters, Free Staters, etc.) who consider running for office in 2012 and beyond.
- People who want to help candidates.

Know someone from the freedom movement that may be interested? Invite them too.

For more information call Muni at 670-2022.
item.name: Candidate workshop
